titles.title: A resolution providing for staff transition for a Senator if the results of the election for an additional term of office of the Senator have not been certified.
A resolution providing for staff transition for a Senator if the results of the election for an additional term of office of the Senator have not been certified.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the transition of a Senator's staff if reelection results for the Senator have not been certified.
